sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, his story is the same.
sections.Biography: He was a [[sellsword]] from [[Braavos]] who traveled to [[The Vale of Arryn]] at the invitation of [[House Corbray]]. Once there he founded [[House Baelish]].<ref>"[[House Baelish (Histories & Lore)]]"</ref>
